text: Rosental Alves wrote to tell me about a CDC site that tracks people who have been vaccinated. "V-safe is a smartphone-based tool that checks in on you after your COVID-19 vaccination. Your participation helps keep COVID-19 vaccines safe â€” for you and for everyone." This answers the question I asked yesterday, why aren't they staying in touch with vaccinated people. There is a system in place, apparently, I just didn't know about it. Now I do, and so do you. :boom:
